claims.claim: Angel Tree effectively assists children of incarcerated parents during the holiday season.
claims.quote: Angel Tree is an organization that go inside the prisons and have the inmates fill out an application for their children to get Christmas presents.

claims.claim: Community members play a significant role in providing transitional support for formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: I get a phone call when I hear that somebody's coming home...I can help them with the CARES Package.

claims.claim: Partnerships with parole officers can efficiently target aid to those in need post-release.
claims.quote: Got in contact with Huron Valley, the parole officer in Huron Valley, and she has a list of women coming home and I can help them with the CARES Package.

claims.claim: Supportive services for formerly incarcerated individuals should include assistance in finding housing.
claims.quote: I personally don't have a house, but I, you know, try to point 'em in the right direction of other organizations I'm partnering with to get 'em housing.

claims.claim: Personal initiatives by community members can substantially support reentry efforts for formerly incarcerated women.
claims.quote: So I help over. Couple of hundred ladies so far.

claims.claim: Holiday initiatives for children of incarcerated parents provide important emotional support.
claims.quote: And then I did Easter. I did Easter. I had Easter Bunny here passing out Easter basket for, you know, children who parents are incarcerated, low income family.

claims.claim: Partnering with existing organizations can amplify the impact of support provided to formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: So I did 50 children who parents were incarcerated. Oh wow. And that was amazing.
